sentence: In order to test this, we calculated the AHS_contradiction score and grouped participants into two categories based on Median Split35,36 of AHS_contradiction score (for detailed distribution of AHS scores on the formal logic and naïve dialecticism, see the Supplementary file: Fig. 1–2): those with a formal logic thinking style and those with a naïve dialectism thinking style.
Significant between-group differences in brain metrics are summarized in Fig. 1.
Results are plotted in Fig. 2 and reported in Supplementary Table 3.
Results were plotted in Fig. 3 and reported in Supplementary Table 4.
The mediation model is visualized in Fig. 4.
